Subject: Mac OS Deployment Script is not working (Setting Server IP)
Description:
Dear Team,
 
Please note we are using Microsoft Intune for the Mac Deployments and the script provided by Netwrix seems like not working.
 
Scenario 1 :  The Server and Port Address : Not Set
 
We tried to run the script to point this to the right server and the script running successfully on local mac and it’s not able to set the server and port address to the EPP Client.
 
Scenario 2 : Deployed Using Intune
 
The package deployed using intune and running the same script from intune but it’s not able to set the server and port address to the EPP Client.
 
Seems Like the provided script is not able to set the server address properly via Intune and Locally.
What_We_Know__c:
Dubai time

17.02
- the post install script doesn't change the IP on all devices
- during the call we collected logs while running the script manually
- opened R&D escalation with logs
- escalated the case to management as the client is impatient
- collected another set of logs and recorded the issue
- made sure Full Disk Access was enabled
- updated R&D escalation
- waiting on customer for remote session

19.02
- escalated the ticket to management as per customer's request

25.03
- retook the logs
- collected Crash Report for EPP
- sent the logs to R&D

26.03
- R&D asked to use the latest script - they provided a download link
- scheduled a remote session with the customer for 28.03

28.03
We tested with the latest script and it worked correctly this time.
The customer will test on more machines and let us know if it works.

02.04
- followed up with the customer about the script

04.04
- followed up again

07.04
- we followed up again, this time the customer told us they are still testing

15.04.
- de-escalated the management ticket because the customer is unresponsive

28.04
- followed up again as the customer is not replying

30.04
- the IP change script does work for the customer
- schedule a remote session to go over the configuration profile

08.05
- the customer is complaining that the deployment script is not automatically enabling Full Disk Access and the network extension
- the extension script shows as successful, but it's the network extension is not always added to the users' macs
- they asked for a configuration profile for Intune, which contains all this

09.05
- as per Alexandra's advice, I asked the customer to open a feature request for a configuration profile
